Welcome to Symboard’s documentation!¶

Symboard settings¶

symboard.settings.DEFAULT_OUTPUT_PATH = './a.keylayout'¶

If no output path is specified, the keylayout will default to being written to the path specified by DEFAULT_OUTPUT_PATH. This string can, but does not need to, end in «.keylayout».

symboard.settings.VERSION = '0.2.0'¶

The current version of symboard being used, equivalent to a string <major_version>.<minor_version>.<patch>

Symboard main¶

Symboard orchestrator¶

Symboard errors¶

exception symboard.errors.BaseSymboardException(msg: str = '')¶

A generic exception which can be thrown when some other exception does not accurately describe the problem, and should be inherited from by all other exceptions used by the Symboard program.

exception symboard.errors.FileExistsException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that the file to be written to already exists, and so cannot be written to.

exception symboard.errors.KeylayoutNoneException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates a keylayout is None, but was expected not to be.

exception symboard.errors.NoneException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that one of the variables in the program is None, but was expected not to be.

exception symboard.errors.NotAFileException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that the file to be parsed does not exist or is not a file.

exception symboard.errors.ParserException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that something has gone wrong when parsing.

exception symboard.errors.SpecificationException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that something has gone wrong when trying to create a keyboard that meets the specification defined by the user.

exception symboard.errors.WriteException(msg: str = '')¶

Indicates that something has gone wrong when writing to file.

Symboard file_writers¶

Symboard parsers¶

class symboard.parsers.FileParser¶

A generic implementation of a file parser which should be inherited from. It contains one method, «parse», which should be overwritten by children of this class.

static parse(file_path: str)¶

A generic implementation of file parsing which should be overwritten by children of this class.

Parameters

file_path (str) – The path of the file to parse.

class symboard.parsers.Parser¶

A generic implementation of a parser which should be inherited from. It contains one method («parse») which should be overwritten by children of this class.

static parse(content)¶

A generic implementation of parsing which should be overwritten by children of this class.

Parameters

content (object) – The content to parse.

class symboard.parsers.StringParser¶

A generic implementation of a string parser which should be inherited from. It contains one method, «parse», which should be overwritten by children of this class.

static parse(content: str)¶

A generic implementation of string parsing which should be overwritten by children of this class.

Parameters

content (str) – The string to parse.

class symboard.parsers.YamlFileParser¶

A file parser which parses yaml files, using the method «parse» as the exposed API function for parsing.

static parse(file_path: str, case_sensitive: bool = True) → Dict¶

An implementation of parsing yaml files.

Parameters

file_path (str) – The path of the yaml file to parse.

Returns

A dictionary containing the parsed data contained by the

specified yaml file.

Return type

Dict

Raises

  • ParserException – If the path does not exist or is not a file; or if

  • some other error occurs. –
